snippet: An analysis of a new United Nations report on violence found that far more homicides are committed with firearms in the Americas than in any other part of the world.
abstract: Analysis of United Nations' Global Status Report on Violence Prevention 2014 reveals that far more homicides are committed with firearms in the Americas than in any other part of the world, in large part due to lax gun laws.
lead_paragraph: An analysis of a new United Nations report on violence found that far more homicides are committed with firearms in the Americas than in any other part of the world.

headline.print_headline: Gun Proliferation Fuels Homicide Rates in the Americas
headline.main: Gun Proliferation Fuels Homicide Rates in the Americas
